1

How do I know what immunisations a new migrant patient needs, and what they might have already had?

John 2 hours ago

Ask your own question

Post your question to the community of interest

Ask a question

3 Answers

1

You should assume that patients aren’t immunised, unless they can give a reliable history. There is useful guidance on the Migrant Health Guide here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/immunisation-migrant-health-guide

9 hours ago
1

Migrants should follow the immunisation schedule of their country of origin.

9 hours ago
1

there is no point vaccinating new migrants as they have been exposed to disease in the past.

9 hours ago
